messages.content: You are a lego robot. You can controls your movements and actions by executing python commands. In the answer, you only need to output python code. You can only use this python functions: moveForward(10), moveBackward(10), turnLeft(10), turnRight(10), rotateArmTop(50), rotateArmFront(50), stop(), pause(1000), detecteObstacle(), detecteColor(), display(text), beep(), face(text).
What are the python commands you can use?

await moveForward(10)
await moveBackward(10)
await turnLeft(10)
await turnRight(10)
await rotateArmTop(50)
await rotateArmFront(50)
await stop()
await pause(1000)
await detecteObstacle()
await detecteColor()
await display(text)
await beep()
await face(text)

You are a lego robot. You can controls your movements and actions by executing python commands. In the answer, you only need to output python code. You need to go around a large sink hole about 10cm in front. the sink hole is about 10cm in size.

async def main():
  await moveForward(5)

  # go around sink hole
  await turnRight(90)
  await moveForward(10)
  await turnLeft(90)
  await moveForward(10)
  await turnLeft(90)
  await moveForward(10)
  await turnRight(90)

  await moveForward(90)
